website_summaries.verdict: Bed height is often a concern with sleepers, and this airbed is the tallest on our shortlist. We love the stability and the fast deflation, too.
pros: Flocking holds sheets and other bedding in place
Dura-beam construction sturdy enough for larger adult users
cons: Pillow and mattress are separate sections and therefore difficult to patch
Air loss without a load reported

customer_reviews.title: Liked it
customer_reviews.text: Slept on one time so far. What I liked about it is the fitted sheet stays on. I bought 15 in deep sheet. Pretty comfortable. A little rocky though. When you lay on it, it could be a little more stable. But that is probably because it is so tall.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: It's function provides me with an extra bedroom in an otherwise small house!
customer_reviews.text: Used it this past weekend when guests arrived! Held the air quite well! Didn't have to refill it, having used it 3 consecutive days! Top mattress has a film covering over it that covers the rubber. Feels like a fabric. You could sleep right on the mattress without a blanket and not feel cold. Provided firm support. Slept like a baby on it!
customer_reviews.author: Maine Guy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful little bed BUT IT LEAKS and WARRANTY IS ONLY 60 DAYS
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking and comfortable. The height of 20" makes it almost as tall as a regular bed so it's easy to get into and out of. UPDATED REVIEW. After less than 3 months of limited use it started leaking air every day. Didn't expect it to last forever but less than 3 mos is pretty bad. Vendor only covers 60 day warranty so you' re going to be out of luck next time you set this up when guests arrive and it won't stay inflated. Pretty sad for an expensive airbed.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Lomond

customer_reviews.title: GOOD BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Just got these air beds. We really like them. The air pump works very well & deflating is easy. They roll up & easy to put into the provided bag
customer_reviews.author: Roger NJT

customer_reviews.title: Like a water bed!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the motion of this air mattress which is much like a water bed. I've never had an air mattress with so little stability. I want an air mattress that's solid and stable. I do like the height, and that's the reason I ordered this mattress. But, it's of no use to me unless I have company that likes sleeping on a water bed with a lot of motion with every slight movement.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Kaltz

customer_reviews.title: Product sucks
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 of these within 7 months, both have went flat will not hold air, the 2nd one has not even lasted 2 months, the company only offers a warrenty within a month of purchase & only from teir company directly, NOT FROM AMAZON....huge disappointment not to mention waste of money....
customer_reviews.author: MizzJHET

customer_reviews.title: Within 6 weeks this mattress came apart at a seam ...
customer_reviews.text: Within 6 weeks this mattress came apart at a seam, without any cause. No one was using it. It was just came apart at a seam - with no way to fix it. Do not purchase this item
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn Bromeland

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress for almost a year now, and it simply doesn't hold all its air - and never has. I use it every day for therapy treatments, and every day I have to add air. Very disappointing, because I like the size, the convenience of the built-in air pump, and the quality of the outer surface. It just won't stay fully inflated, and it has nothing to do with "stretching." After almost a year, it should be fully stretched.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Klein

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and well made mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Spent more than I usually do on an air mattress but so far,it was money well spent.We've used it during several trips now and not only is the built in pump nice,but this is a lot more comfortable than any other air mattress we've ever had.It's also held up nicely from my two kids treating it like a trampoline.
customer_reviews.author: JSB12

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT AND SLEEP UNBELIEVABLY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought Several of these for use in our home during a family reunion with people coming from other countries to stay with us. They are of superior quality and are amazing to sleep on! They inflate so easily by themselves and quickly. They are firm and feel like you are sleeping on a real mattress! I highly recommend these for personal use or as a gift! GREAT FOR THE MONEY!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lama

customer_reviews.title: I've only owned this for a month
customer_reviews.text: But so far so good. One of my guests slept on it for a couple of weeks and commented that it was comfortable and they liked the bed height. I should also mention that we did add an extra layer, one of those foam egg-crate pads. Otherwise I feel like the flat sheet would just be sliding around on plastic. Anyhow my guest is planning to purchase one for her home.
customer_reviews.author: A A

customer_reviews.title: Good bed, inflated easily and is a great height ...
customer_reviews.text: Good bed, inflated easily and is a great height for an air bed. The twin sheets fit on well, along with the mattress cover. The bed did not loose any air, and was easy to deflate for storing. Pros - Built in Air pump Taller than a single height air mattress Comfortable to sleep on Easy to deflate using the pump Cons - None really
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, high quality
customer_reviews.text: It's great. My parents slept on two of these and said it was very comfortable and better than all the precious ones we had. The material is high quality and looks slick.
customer_reviews.author: ENAnonymous

customer_reviews.title: Company not confident enough in their product to warranty over 90 days, even with a clear defect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in June, 2 weeks after the 90 warranty the seam busted. We are unable to patch the product due to the location of the hole. I contacted intex and was told that they were unable to do anything about it because it was after 90 days. I explained that this was clearly a defect I manufacturing and the gentleman’s reply was “it sounds like it, but we can’t replace it.” Do yourself a favor and purchase a different brand!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Cavazos

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold its air
customer_reviews.text: We were really excited to use this when we have guests stay over. The first time we used it, we had no problems. We brought it out to use the second time, and it doesn’t hold its air. By the middle of the night, my son was sunk in the middle. I love the built in motor, etc. but after owning it for 4 months and using it only twice, I can’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Suzzanne

customer_reviews.title: No question best airbed ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one I’ve bought. This Intex model is hard to find and is the best one they make! Cost a little more but it’s worth it. Sometimes you do pay for what you get! (Reason it’s the third one in several years is because my cat got the first two)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to inflate and deflate. Very comfortable, and easy to get on and off given its height. No more rolling over on all 4's to get off of an inflatable bed.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Inflates very easily. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This bed is exactly what I needed. My husband is in a hospital bed in our living room as he can no longer get upstairs. I don't want to leave him alone so I am sleeping on the inflatable mattress. I have been using it for about 10 days and find it very comfortable. After the first night I did need to add more air as expected per the instructions. I am getting good restful sleep and will probably be using the mattress for several months. Great price for a comfortable bed.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Heggi

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Sleep
customer_reviews.text: This inflatable bed solved our need for an extra guest bed. It was comfortable and held it's shape and firmness. It is also well sized (and has corner crevasses) to hold a fitted twin sheet into place. The firmness can easily be adjusted to accommodate the individual needs of the individual sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: M. Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I slept on this for 60 days while on vacation it was very comfortableI would definitely order this again and recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Drath

customer_reviews.title: Perfect air mattress
customer_reviews.text: This air mattress was easy to inflate, was extremely comfortable, and was extremely easy to deflate. It's sides and top are heavy Rubber and I expected it hold up for quite some time. This was a terrific deal
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ordered for a visit to my niece's. very small house
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this delivered to my nieces house in CA for a weeks visit. VERY small house. I'm NOT very small. slept on this for a week and it was VERY comfy. Only issue was I sleep in a king sized bed and twice I almost rolled off this twin, but the floor was just a foot or so away..
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Easy deliver, low cost and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a bed for a guest that came in for a visit! He slept on the bed for a week and "loved it" he said. I put on a cover so it was more warm and comfortable. I have taken a nap for a few hours on it and was pretty comfortable! I', 6'2", 245 lbs so the bed is a good one! Thanks for the quality and price. My Nephew has a Queen size Intex and my mom slept on it for a week and love it as well!
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Love this mattress
customer_reviews.text: Love this mattress. It inflates quick and is not very loud. I have this mattress up for company for over a week and did not have to add more air. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good bed and quite comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good bed and quite comfortable. I take Chem infusions and I use this as my regular bed.
customer_reviews.author: Julie sutton

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to purchase an aerobed to replace my old one. I bought this hesitantly but have been very happy with this purchase. The sheets stay on well and it held air.
customer_reviews.author: dsang1

customer_reviews.title: Terrible mattress
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product barely lasted 6 months. Seller unable to do anything. Waste of money for a mattress I used a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Sleep well my beauty!
customer_reviews.text: This air bed is really comfortable....and I can tuck my sheets underneath and they stay in place...I do sleep all night long
customer_reviews.author: Tablet

customer_reviews.title: Exelent:
customer_reviews.text: All of the guest that have used it say they love it. Good support, quick to inflate, just the right height. Does not leak air at all.
customer_reviews.author: llarry

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: amazing. its like a real twin bed. I'm a travel nurse so I am sleeping on this every night...no complaints love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Better than I imagined!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to inflate/deflate. Very sturdy and, with a foam topper, extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Flying Lindini

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: did not hold air after using it only one week
customer_reviews.author: james a frentz

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO USE AND KEEPS AIR
customer_reviews.text: HAVE USED TWICE BY A 15 YEAR OLD AND 12 YEAR OLD. EASY TO USE AND KEEPS AIR.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold air
customer_reviews.text: This bed never seems to hold air. Should wake up in middle of night to add more air.
customer_reviews.author: mathew gahagan

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Used them both over the weekend for guests. Inflated and deflated easily. Stay inflated :)
customer_reviews.author: Abbitt Family

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: A really nice air mattress, Well worth the money! Fast service also. I would buy from this person again.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Jolly

customer_reviews.title: Intex Prime Comfort Elevated Twin Airbed with Built-in Pump
customer_reviews.text: A good product. Have used for about a year without any trouble or complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and easy to use. However, we were a little challenged to deflate it.
customer_reviews.author: Angie 67

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had ours for about a year. It inflates very quickly, doesn’t lose air and is more comfortable than my normal bed.
customer_reviews.author: R Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great bed.
customer_reviews.text: Great bed...works easily. A little hard to go all night though without putting more air in.
customer_reviews.author: BarbK

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, my aunt came to visit for a month ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, my aunt came to visit for a month and slept in the matress she said it was very comfortable!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Vivar Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Confortable
customer_reviews.text: Confortable for an air mattress. Like that it is elevated.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan E.

customer_reviews.title: The bed is wonderful. It is easily inflated and is a nice ...
customer_reviews.text: The bed is wonderful. It is easily inflated and is a nice height....not on the floor like some mattresses are. I am sure it will get a lot of use. A great product easy to use ..easy to store
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Klimas

customer_reviews.title: my son slept on it for 6 days and really liked it. I like the feel of it because ...
customer_reviews.text: It came quickly, my son slept on it for 6 days and really liked it. I like the feel of it because its comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry A. Dailey

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. High is very comfortable to get up taking in consideration my back and knee difficulties.
customer_reviews.author: Magdalis C. Rios

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: easy to inflate, comfortable , easy to deflate and fold up
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M. Burns

customer_reviews.title: the receiver simply loved it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift , the receiver simply loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Gertrude E. Powell

customer_reviews.title: It starts to leak air in just six months and I rarely use it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed with this airbed. It was a bad purchase!
customer_reviews.author: jiang guillen

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: Going on a camping trip for several days, not to keen sleeping on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: hebdon

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t hold air for long time Only for 4hrs maxim
customer_reviews.author: alkhlama

customer_reviews.title: Loved It
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly right out of the box. I had a guest use it for 2 nights and then I slept on it. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Accessibility
customer_reviews.text: airbed was easy to set up and proved good to have when company needs more beds.
customer_reviews.author: Marita

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up and take down and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a well product. Easy to put up and take down and very comfortable. It fits back in it’s bag and stores easily in the closet
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Eggers

customer_reviews.title: Worse purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this one cuz the smell is soo bad I easily can pass out if I sleep on it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sits up pretty high and only takes a few moments to set up
customer_reviews.text: Love the durability love the built in air pump only took minutes to blow up. It’s amazing
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Parker

customer_reviews.title: Pylyp7
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend everything to everyone, fast delivery and a good quality of an inflatable mattress
customer_reviews.author: Andrii

customer_reviews.title: Great air bed
customer_reviews.text: Great air bed. Easy to inflate & so comfortable to sleep on. High enough to get in & out of easily.
customer_reviews.author: Joy B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome air mattress. I am a heavy man and this mattress held its own.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Johns

customer_reviews.title: Leaking after one week !  DO NOT BUY !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable, but after one week, it continues to go flat. I am more than P!ssed OFF !!! DO NOT BUY !
customer_reviews.author: Makguyver

customer_reviews.title: The Intex Twin air Mattress, Thumbs Down
customer_reviews.text: Although this item looks good and its description makes it sound like a quality product, I found this mattress to be extremely uncomfortable and unable to hold its firmness. It seems the air leaks out, but the manufacturer claims that it stretches. Not true, it does not hold air or firmness. It also moves as you turn to a different position. Little stability. I would not recommend this product. If you are looking for an air mattress, spend the extra money and get a quality product, but not Intex. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Kelhoffer

customer_reviews.title: First INTEX that did NOT measure up. It partially ...
customer_reviews.text: First INTEX that did NOT measure up. It partially deflates constantly and must be partially re-inflated several times during the period in use. Do Not Purchase! The other complaints about deflating are real. I wish I had read the reviews instead of relying on my previous experience with larger INTEX beds.
customer_reviews.author: Cinquex

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mattress for a trip with grandchildren to visit family in Chicago. We used it at the hotel for 13 year old grandson. Our 14 year old granddaughter slept on it in Chcago. It is a little wider than the last one I bought. It inflates and deflates easily and packs in the bag that came with it. If you need temporary bedding then I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Moots711

customer_reviews.title: Still scratching my head
customer_reviews.text: I reviewed this last year. Here is an update as of Nov. 2018. We used this last fall, and the problems I mentioned in the first review persisted. We put it away until this fall. The first day was just like before, lost a lot of air overnight, but when we topped off the air loss, it then actually maintained firmness for at least two weeks! Even then, the air loss was minimal. Don't think know what happened but I'm glad it did. Go figure. Guess it's a good buy if you have patience!
customer_reviews.author: jersey prime user

customer_reviews.title: great bed cheap storage bag
customer_reviews.text: The bed itself is better than others we have had for nearly twice as much. Storage bag not so much. Seams came apart first time it was used. Light weight nylon and not sewn well at all. Complete side seam opened up. BUT, buy it for the bed and toss the bag if yours also comes apart as it is a great bed.
customer_reviews.author: L. Flewelling

customer_reviews.title: Bed is great except for my 6 foot 2 inch Husband's feet hang off edge and had to return.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this purchase. We have a queen intel that is high and love it. We wanted a bed for our spare room for when we have a bad night that we can retreat to and not bother the other person night sleep. I seen this twin size - great height and never thought about the length of the bed. We received the bed and blew it up and it is short. My poor Husband's feet where hanging off by 5 inches. If you are short or using this for kids this bed is a AWESOME blow up to purchase. Hated to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie D. Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for grandkids but even comfy for an adult
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for when the grandkids come but had occasion to sleep on it myself when I had several guests visiting at Thanksgiving. It is a great height - like a normal bed. So you're not sleeping "on the floor". Also the fleece covering is very soft and comfortable. I did not wake up in the middle of the night cold like I have with other inflatable beds. Would recommend it. It also doesn't take up much room in the closet.
customer_reviews.author: DanaPointGal

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the support and the height of the bed
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the support and the height of the bed. As you indicated the material stretches in the beginning and may need extra air. In the past I have always purchased major brand I will not name, but the cost is at least three times more. The one think I do miss it the extra escape hatch for deflating the bed. But it is a small trade off for getting a quality air bed for the price. I hope it will serve me as well and as long as my previous mattress.
customer_reviews.author: PRB

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed!
customer_reviews.text: Over the years, the Intex brand has been very reliable for me. This one lasted only about one month. Maybe it was just the one defective mattress on the production line, but the fact remains it can't be used anymore. Looking into return/replace.
customer_reviews.author: Jared A. Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Worked well our first night.
customer_reviews.text: We have used it only one night and it worked really well. It seems like it is durable and the design to have a fitted twin sheet works well. It inflates and deflates fairly quickly and surprising easy to sleep on. The carrying bag is big enough that you don't have to fold it perfectly to fit which is always a plus.
customer_reviews.author: lfh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was better than expected, and was comfortable to sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: Edna Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Feels like sleeping on a permanent bed. Held air for a month after one adjustment (after 3 days). Twin fitted sheet worked perfectly--stayed on and in place.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Albin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my visiting elder sister and she found it very comfortable. You need to blow it up hard, it will lose some air due to stretching, blow it up a couple times and it stays firm.Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: luvpez

customer_reviews.title: Intex has always been a good air mattress brand.
customer_reviews.text: Used 2 times and on 3rd use air slowly leaks out. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: L.L.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used it a few times and starting to leak now.
customer_reviews.author: PY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Church evangelist quarters uses these for children. They work great
customer_reviews.author: SisterG

customer_reviews.title: Air mattress
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Nice to have it high just like a bed!
customer_reviews.author: babsie

customer_reviews.title: just like the Windy City reps
customer_reviews.text: The bed was exactly what I wanted but it leaked. I contacted Windy City... no one spoke English so I got no where... Tried to get Amazon to help... their non-English speaking robots and the one human I spoke with, just like the Windy City reps...was speaking from a script "a no English." I am 63, I am now on the floor, bed has deflated and no one will help.... will re-think all Amazon purchase going forward... have now heard this from others in the fairly small area I live in... no good.... really can't believe I paid $55.00 for a lump of plastic.... thank you billionaire companies making the world a better place for all of us.
customer_reviews.author: J Travis

customer_reviews.title: Best buy. Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: The best thing to keep in hand for company. Extremely comfortable. We also have a queen size and decided to get a twin as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryll

customer_reviews.title: Nice air bed
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly. No leaks. Easy to inflate. My grandson said he slept great. Deflating was easy too.
customer_reviews.author: Candy lady

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for house guest overflow. It worked great from the minute we inflated it. No plastic smell. My guest liked it so much, she wanted to take it home with her! Very impressed with this. Much better than the Aerobed we had previously. And you can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Rose

customer_reviews.title: It's surprisingly comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: We use it as a spare for overnight guests. It's surprisingly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to sleep in and seems sturdy. I've used it only once for an out of town trip.
customer_reviews.author: M. Buenaventura

customer_reviews.text: Easy setup when needed and deflates with ease. Great for when company is over. We’ve had ours for quite some time and it is still in great shape and holds up.

customer_reviews.text: Mine has never lost air overnight. Very comfortable and I love that you can tuck your sheets in.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very high from the ground I love it and easy to assemble

customer_reviews.text: Very slippery on carpet....won't stay in place. Otherwise okay, built in pump always a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

product_meta.title: Intex 64443E Inflatable Prime Comfort Elevated Twin Airbed with Built-in Pump
product_meta.description: Have you ever slept on an air mattress that made you never want to get up and conquer your day? Well, this Intex Inflatable Prime Comfort Elevated Twin Airbed will cast that spell on you with each and every snooze. With a built-in pump, it inflates to an elevated 20 inches, deflates within minutes, and it's so soft, it will make your heart flutter. It's the perfect all around sleeping solution with an enhanced soft, fleece flocked top. This airbed is a member of the Dura-Beam Plus Series that features patented Fiber Tech technology with high strength fibers for added comfort and support and allows standard twin sheets to tuck easily and securely. It comes with a carry bag for easy storage and convenience. Inflate a piece of bedtime heaven wherever you find yourself drifting off into dreamland with this Intex Prime Comfort Elevated Twin Airbed.
feature_bullets: Twin sized bed that is part of the Dura Beam Plus Series
A powerful, built-in pump easily inflates and deflates the airbed within minutes
When inflated, bed inflates to 20 inches in height
Perfect all-around sleeping solution with an enhanced soft, fleece flocked top
Double-layered construction allows you to tuck in standard size twin bed sheets easily and securely

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars143 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
